thread.section_title: Rome Glam Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cozy and Briliant
thread.title_full: Cozy and Briliant - Review of Rome Glam Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Mohsen S
title: Cozy and Briliant
text:
It was our fisrt time visiting Italy.
Have booked the hotel online. Honestly did not expect this much quality and I believe that I was lucky to catch it.
Staff:
Great, they know what to do. Well trained. Had no problem at all.
Breakfast:
Very complete. You can have all the thing you imagine for the breakfast have a walk on the roof as well and see the rome city from top.
Room:
We had standard room. Was very nice designed. Clean. Everything was in order. Bed was comfort to sleep. Air condition system was great and working. Wi-Fi speed was perfect. TV is equipped with soundbar system. You have speaker in the bathroom as well.
Location:
Close to hop on hopp off 1st stop(3 min)
Close to Fauntain de trevi(5 min)
